issues.description:
A possible integer overflow exists in the function `changeStatus(string)`.
The addition or multiplication may result in a value higher than the maximum representable integer.
issues.title: Integer Overflow

issues.description:
The function `fallback` executes the SUICIDE instruction. The remaining Ether is sent to a stored address.

There is a check on storage index 13. This storage index can be written to by calling the function `fallback`.
issues.title: Unchecked SUICIDE
